about_the_game:
Unleash the Ultimate Survival Experience


Welcome to the ultimate survival camp, where the stakes are high and the rewards are even higher. Here, you'll have access to the latest and greatest resources and equipment to help you take on the hordes of zombies and ruthless survivors that stand in your way. But it's not just about surviving, it's about thriving.

Join Forces with Other Survivalists


In the face of danger, there's no greater ally than a trusted teammate. Join forces with other like-minded individuals and take on the toughest challenges together. But remember, not everyone can be trusted. Stay vigilant, gather supplies, and upgrade your defenses and gear to stay ahead of the competition.

Build Your Own Community and Defend It


In this unforgiving world, it's important to surround yourself with those who have your back. Build your own community of survivalists, trade resources, and work together to defend your camp against any threat. With the right team by your side, you'll be able to take on anything the world throws at you.

Unlock Rewards and Advance to the Top


As you complete missions and overcome challenges, you'll earn experience and cash to upgrade your equipment and resources. But it's not just about survival, it's about becoming the ultimate survivor. Rise to the top of the leaderboard and unlock exclusive rewards that will give you the edge in battle.

Join the Camp Now and Take Control of Your Destiny


Don't wait any longer, join the camp now and take control of your destiny. With the right resources, teammates, and strategy, you'll be able to survive and thrive in the face of any challenge. So what are you waiting for? Sign up now and let the ultimate survival experience begin!

content_descriptors.notes: Warning this game contains violence, guns and blood.

detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

Unleash the Ultimate Survival Experience


Welcome to the ultimate survival camp, where the stakes are high and the rewards are even higher. Here, you'll have access to the latest and greatest resources and equipment to help you take on the hordes of zombies and ruthless survivors that stand in your way. But it's not just about surviving, it's about thriving.

In the face of danger, there's no greater ally than a trusted teammate. Join forces with other like-minded individuals and take on the toughest challenges together. But remember, not everyone can be trusted. Stay vigilant, gather supplies, and upgrade your defenses and gear to stay ahead of the competition.

With the right team by your side, you'll be able to take on anything the world throws at you.

Rise to the top of the leaderboard and unlock exclusive rewards that will give you the edge in battle.

Join the Camp Now and Take Control of Your Destiny


Don't wait any longer, join the camp now and take control of your destiny. With the right resources, teammates, and strategy, you'll be able to survive and thrive in the face of any challenge. So what are you waiting for? Sign up now and let the ultimate survival experience begin!
name: ApoZomb

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: dual core 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 2GB / AMD R9 280 better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 / AMD R9 Fury
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: The zombie are coming, and the fate of your survival is in your hands. Join the fight to defend your territory and secure vital supplies. Don't become one of the monsters. With every decision you make, you'll be one step closer to survival. Act now and secure your chance to outlast the outbreak!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Czech
